articles.description: While the Moon is presently unsuitable for habitation, there could have been life on its surface about four billion years ago, researchers have suggested.

articles.title: NASA Scientists Reveal New Information on Mars' Formation and Evolution, Claim The Red Planet has a Porous Crust - http://www.newsgram.com/
articles.description: Washington, Septemeber 15, 2017 : Mars’s crust is not as dense as previously thought and a lower density likely means that at least part of the Red Planet’s crust is relatively porous, says a new NASA study. The findings, published in the journal Geophysical …

NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope and the ground-based Gemini Observatory in Hawaii have teamed up with the Juno spacecraft to probe the mightiest storms on the giant planet Jupiter.

articles.title: NASA releases its latest Global maps of Earth at Night, provides clearest patterns of Human Settlement across the Planet - http://www.newsgram.com/
articles.description: NASA has released its latest global maps of Earth at night, providing the "clearest yet composite" view of patterns of human settlement across our planet.
